A

acceptMessage(AMessage) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureWorldEnv
Process a message received by the TFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer This version only process answers to moveto and detectsat messages
addLastFutureClausesToPastClauses() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
This function should add all the clauses stored in the list futureToPast to the formula stored in solver.
AMessage - Class in apryraz.tworld
Class for representing messages exchanged between agents and the World interface object
AMessage(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class apryraz.tworld.AMessage
Class constructor
apryraz.tworld - package apryraz.tworld
This package contains an implementation of the Treasure World, where an agent has to find the location of the Treasure using the detector sensor to get information about the world.

B

buildGamma() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
This function builds the initial logical formula of the agent and stores it into the solver object.

C

coordToLineal(int, int, int) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Convert a coordinate pair (x,y) to the integer value t_[x,y] of variable that stores that information in the formula, using offset as the initial index for that subset of position variables (past and future position variables have different variables, so different offset values)

D

DetectsAt() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Send to the environment object the question: "Does the detector sense something around(agentX,agentY) ?"

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureWorld
This function should load five arguments from the command line: arg[0] = dimension of the word arg[1] = x coordinate of treasure position arg[2] = y coordinate of treasure position arg[3] = num of steps to perform arg[4] = file name with sequence of steps to perform
moveTo(int, int) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Use agent "actuators" to move to (x,y) We simulate this why telling to the World Agent (environment) that we want to move, but we need the answer from it to be sure that the movement was made with success
moveToNext() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Ask the agent to move to the next position, by sending an appropriate message to the environment object.

P

performInferenceQuestions() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
This function should check, using the future variables related to possible positions of Treasure, whether it is a logical consequence that Treasure is NOT at certain positions.

R

runNextStep() - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
Execute the next step in the sequence of steps of the agent, and then use the agent sensor to get information from the environment.
runStepsSequence(int, int, int, int, String) - Static method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureWorld
This function should execute the sequence of steps stored in the file fileSteps, but only up to numSteps steps.

setEnvironment(TreasureWorldEnv) - Method in class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder

T

TFState - Class in apryraz.tworld
 
TFState(int) - Constructor for class apryraz.tworld.TFState
 
TreasureFinder - Class in apryraz.tworld
This agent performs a sequence of movements, and after each movement it "senses" from the evironment the resulting position and then the outcome from the smell sensor, to try to locate the position of Treasure
TreasureFinder(int) - Constructor for class apryraz.tworld.TreasureFinder
The class constructor must create the initial Boolean formula with the rules of the Treasure World, initialize the variables for indicating that we do not have yet any movements to perform, make the initial state.
TreasureWorld - Class in apryraz.tworld
The class for the main program of the Barcenas World
